# java工程师实例参考手册（廖清远）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan
java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan
java-gongchengshi-shili-cankaoshouce-liao-qingyuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
